Reviews.Title: Eh.
Reviews.Author: Bramwell
Reviews.Content: This thing looks real and will work for my purposes. Only problem is there is no easy way to get it open to put the batteries in. The screws are really long and the holes they are in are very deep (I actually needed a computer repair screwdriver to reach down in there, as my regular screwdriver was too wide for the holes). Perfect product? Nope. But good enough for ~$7.

Reviews.Title: Worth every penny!
Reviews.Author: Katydana "I enjoy reference books, historical...
Reviews.Content: I've had a crazy neighbor dispute for months, she screams insane accusations at the top of her lungs in the middle of the street. Well I bought these because I wanted her to think I was serious about gathering " evidence" for a restraining order.I'm happy to report she hasn't said 1 word to me since the day of instillation, literally I went from being verbally attacked EVERY time I opened my front door to silence!This camera is sturdy and very realistic looking.I don't have the lights on because ive never seen a real camera flashing constantly so in my opinion it makes the camera look fake but the lights work fine on my 2 cameras.Shortly after getting them a friend who's got 22 years with the local police dept came by and while talking about my neighbor he asked to see the footage believing the cameras were real, that to me wad worth every penny.

Reviews.Title: Not very impressed.
Reviews.Author: J. Luigi
Reviews.Content: The camera is much smaller than I had expected, and it's so obviously fake that the only way it'll deter a burglary is if the thief laughs himself to death on my patio when he sees it.I gave it a couple of stars only because the metal bracket that holds it seems to be fairly good quality, much more so than the obviously plastic camera.I'll still install it, but I think the deterrent value will be exactly zero.  Good thing it was cheap.

Reviews.Title: don't waste your money
Reviews.Author: audrina1
Reviews.Content: Item came broken, does not have a "flashing light" like the description states. I would have returned it, if it wasn't going to be such a hassle.

Reviews.Title: Lasts a LONG time, but beware of the tiny phillips head screws holding this together
Reviews.Author: Kleecker "Kleecker"
Reviews.Content: Seemed to last a year, due to huge "C" batteries.  However, the micro-Phillips head screws which you need to remove in order to replace batteries are from hell.  Royally.  I have a small screw driver set, and even so, most of the 4 screws were extremely difficult to remove.  Once removed, I observed that the heads were becoming very stripped.  I don't know if next year I would be able to remove them again to replace batteries.I tried drilling out for larger screws, but all this did was basically destroy i and now I have to purchase another unit.  I have 3 units so I can't wait to see what the others have in store..  Those tiny tiny Phillips head screws are a piece of junk, even if you have the proper screw driver set.  Best to try a #2 phillips.  This is definitely the achilles heel of this product,I'm glad I waited to replace the batteries before reviewing.  I would have given 5 start, but those ridiculous screws rated a "1" in my book, averaging to a 3 overall.

Reviews.Title: Very effective for the price!
Reviews.Author: Arthur J Davis
Reviews.Content: The camera was pretty easy to install, and looks very realistic. Runs on two "C" batteries, and you have to remove the four screws located in bottom of housing to get at the battery compartment. Also, to remove the screws you will need a very small philipshead screwdriver. I had to fiddle a little with the two batteries before the light started flashing, but once I got it working it there were no more problems.I have had it for a week and so far I am very pleased.

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: Chris Soiya
Reviews.Content: For 5.22$ It is great. Doesn't look very real close up, but when mounted it would definitely be enough to scare away an intruder. Havnen't bothered putting the batteries in, because the other reviews have explained how tough it is to do so. Looks cool in my room as decoration, one of the best value buy's I have gotten on amazon!

Reviews.Title: Video security camera
Reviews.Author: corerunner "voraciousreader"
Reviews.Content: The product was received in a timely manner but did not have mounting instructions nor the mounting hardware included. It would have been nice to see preferred mounting recommedations instead of the decal. Not a big deal because it's just three screws which I had at home.

Reviews.Title: wouldn't fool a pro but....
Reviews.Author: Bradford L. Simonds
Reviews.Content: works well but looks a little cheesy, a professional thief wouldn't be fooled for a second but most people would be.

Reviews.Title: The Best fake camera I've bought
Reviews.Author: Wayne
Reviews.Content: It's easy to put the batteries in, pop the rain guard top off, you'll see the battery lid, push clip, pop off put 2 AA batteries in, close up install, adjust. I using in conjunction with my home alarm system which has a siren on reach side of the house, I mounted these right next to the siren. Very realistic!!! Would recommend to any one wanting to trick the bad guys.

Reviews.Title: Research
Reviews.Author: sunluvin
Reviews.Content: Make sure you research. I couldn't find a place to put a battery. It wasn't worth buying & I returned it. It wasn't a good investment for me.

Reviews.Title: Dummy Security Cameras
Reviews.Author: GF
Reviews.Content: These look real!  I've had neighbors stopme to comment on how smart it is to use security cameras to protect my home!

Reviews.Title: Good Fake Camera
Reviews.Author: Frank
Reviews.Content: This camera works as advertised. Although totally made of plastic, it looks realistic enough. The red LED light blinks. It uses batteries that can last for several months. No wiring needed for installation.

Reviews.Title: Perfect Fake Security Camera
Reviews.Author: Mario C. Elia "ORION"
Reviews.Content: The "camera" arrived on time, in excellent condition, as advertised and at a "good" price. I set it up outside my front door in about 15 minutes. It works perfectly, flashing a red light, simulating recording as does a real camera system. That should be enough deterrent for a thief or worse. If not, I am armed.

Reviews.Title: Adorable and can't tell from real!
Reviews.Author: Palmetto State
Reviews.Content: Very nice little fake dummy camera.  I could not help but think that they took a real camera but just left out the electronics and the glass lense.  Has a real coaxial cable with a real coaxial fitting that I tied to the base of the mount.  Other than than it feels and looks like a real camera.  Takes two C-cell batteries and has an on off switch for the blinking little red LED on the front.  You will need a small-ish phillips head screw driver to remove the 4 screws that hold the battery cover on.I bought five of these and mounted them everywhere.  Many times with just one screw.  My neighbors were all a flitter with my new security system.  I did not tell my nice neighbor that they were fake.  Got to be very careful who you divulge that information to.

Reviews.Title: does its job
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Looks rather real from a distance, only put up as a prevention.  Seems to be doing its job quite nicely.

Reviews.Title: nice
Reviews.Author: James M. Hiner Jr.
Reviews.Content: Looks real, super easy to install, for the price you simply can't go wrong.I'm hoping that it acts as a form of security, only time will tell.

Reviews.Title: Not as good as you think
Reviews.Author: Ronnie
Reviews.Content: I read all the reviews on this camera and I wish pepole would say what the camera is really like. After reading the reviews I went ahead and ordered 2 camera's. just got them today, I must say that I was very very disappointed, the camera looks very very cheap, the only good thing is the flashing red light on it. If you are thing of getting this camera install it in a high place so others can't see how cheap it looks. this camera should sell for $3.00 at the most.

ProductInfo.Features:
Fake Dummy Simulated Security Surveillance Box Camera with Flashing Red LED Light
Use this to prevent or deter suspicious activity by placing the security camera in a noticeable place
The flashing LED light (Powered By 2 'C' Cell Batteries and Batteries Not Included )
This camera can be mounted to either the wall or ceiling. Metal bracket
Easy to install. 1 bonus warning security Decal 3"x2"
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu Fake Dummy Simulated Security Camera with Flashing Red LED Light Free Warning Decal 1PY
